channel.title: So
channel.description:
..My girlfriend is extremely pissed at me. Why? Because I looked at her fucking phone.
She says it's because I don't trust her...but apparently, she doesn't trust me with her phone. Because obviously there is something she doesn't want me to see, right?
Should she just be able to let me look at her phone...? Is it normal for a girl to do this?

item.title: So
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

[quote=“vManlyMan, post:46, topic:429442”][quote author=chillwitm888 link=topic=532130.msg3888704#msg3888704 date=1326676613]
Does she hang out with other guys?
And
Ohaider travas :3
[/quote]

Even if she does, that’s no reason to suspect she’s cheating. With my last girlfriend, I hung out with other girls and she always accused me of cheating on her with them. Hated it.[/quote]Exactly

We were in a bad fight, but she got over it within like 5 hours, so that’s good. Now we’re better than we were before, so I guess it’s good we had this fight :o

Read full topic

[quote=“Travas, post:1, topic:429442”]…My girlfriend is extremely pissed at me. Why? Because I looked at her fucking phone.

She says it’s because I don’t trust her…but apparently, she doesn’t trust me with her phone. Because obviously there is something she doesn’t want me to see, right?

Should she just be able to let me look at her phone…?
Is it normal for a girl to do this?[/quote]
sounds like someone has something to hide, or suspects you’re hiding something.

item.title: So
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

I like my privacy, that’s why i lock my door. Privacy shouldn’t include phones!

If she wanted privacy she wouldn’t text, anyone can pick up what she says noradays.

item.title: So
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

[quote=“amy_webb, post:42, topic:429442”]Kill her, ends all problems… With her atleast. :D[/quote]inb4iactuallydoit

But, I told her what is what. I said, we need to be able to trust each other with our phones.

She said, “I don’t let you touch my phone because I like a little privacy, it’s not that I don’t trust you…”

Read full topic

[quote=“amy_webb, post:33, topic:429442”]No trust there.

She probs just doesn’t want you going through her texts, so do it infront of her![/quote]That’s what I’m planning on doing.

I told her, I’m gonna stop dating her if she doesn’t trust me with her phone. I told her she can take my phone whenever she wants, and I better be able to do the same.

item.title: So
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

[quote=“amy_webb, post:31, topic:429442”]Did you ask to check hers? or did you just go through it?[/quote]I’ve asked to use her phone before, she said no. Really pissed me off.

One day during class, i had to get my book from our locker…it was sitting right there…i was tempted to look at it, and i did. She SOMEHOW found out. But eh. It was bad of me to do that when she said no, but I’m texting her right now (because this whole fight started at her house, so i walked out the door) and she said I am allowed to look at her phone in front of her now. So that’s good i guess…

Read full topic
